links.title: The Countdown to Apple's (AAPL) 'Gather Round' Event Begins
links.description: The countdown for Apple's (AAPL) mega event of the year has begun. On the 11th anniversary of the iPhone, the buzz around one of the world's most iconic phones will reach its peak on September 12 when Apple's newest line-up will be unveiled at the Steve Jobs Theater on the new Apple Park campus.
